about_the_game:
SAVE AMANI is a adventure game about war. Players will help a child named Amani escape from various dangers during the war by solving puzzles. Players can feel the cruelty of war and the devastation and damage to people's lives and souls, thereby arousing people's appreciation for peace and attention to children in war.





Game Features

The city ravaged by war is in ruins and a mess. The once glorious buildings have now turned into ruins, the streets are covered in gravel and scorched earth, the smoke of gunpowder permeates, and the sky is gloomy. The ruthlessness of war deprives cities of vitality and energy, leaving behind endless sadness and painful memories. People are displaced, their homes are shattered, and the shadow of war covers every inch of the land, which is heartbreaking. ‌




The enemy is lurking in all directions, soldiers armed with live ammunition may appear at any time, drones hover continuously in the air, mechanical dogs patrol along the necessary routes, and in addition, one must always be vigilant of collapsed walls, landmines hidden in the soil, and shells that may fall from the air. Every step is full of unknowns and dangers.




Be sure to hide and stay as far away as possible from enemy drones. Once scanned and locked by them, Oman will face the danger of being shot.




He can control his small drone, explore the situation ahead, and effectively lure away enemies, with a wide range of uses.




War rages on, innocent children, and little boy Aman witnesses his home shattered and his loved ones scattered. The warm embrace of the past has become a cold memory, a tender heart that endures endless sorrow.
To commemorate the deceased teacher, light a candle and offer the sincerest wishes and thoughts.




Multiple spaces support switching from a third person perspective to a first person perspective for exploration.




Help Aman find that QR code, just put on VR glasses and scan it, and he can immerse himself in the illusory scene that was not destroyed before the war. The former campus, classrooms, streets, libraries, amusement parks, and central square are all vividly remembered. Every time he puts on his VR glasses, Oman's face blooms with a smile, as he can once again see his former family, classmates, teachers, and those familiar environments.




However, when he took off his glasses and reality came into view again, Oman's heart was filled with endless sadness. ‌




Once upon a time, the little boy Aman was like a ray of sunshine in winter, with a warm and bright smile, and a pure light shining in his eyes. He loves sunshine, warmth, clouds, nature, and small animals. However, now his eyes no longer flicker and he can only hide himself in the darkness. It seems that things that are within everyone's reach have become an unattainable luxury for Oman.




Separated by a wall, the two worlds are completely separated, with no hope of crossing over. However, the boy Aman still needs to gather courage and move forward resolutely in the midst of danger.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 可在画面设置为“低”、1080p/60fps的情况下进行游戏。 ・必须使用64位处理器与操作系统。

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
